Brief description of what this PR does.

## Type of Change

- [ ] New skill
- [ ] New command
- [ ] Org-knowledge template update
- [ ] MCP server change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Other

## Checklist

- [ ] `plugin.json` is valid JSON
- [ ] All command `.md` files have YAML frontmatter with `name` and `description`
- [ ] All skill `SKILL.md` files have YAML frontmatter with `name` and `description`
- [ ] Org-knowledge YAML files parse without errors
- [ ] MCP server builds (`cd servers/docx-generator && npm run build`)
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated under `[Unreleased]`
- [ ] Tested with at least one sample RFP

How was this change tested? What RFP types or scenarios were used?
